statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, behavior_category FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE behavior_category IN ('loyal', 'churned');
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior_data ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE behavior_category = 'loyal' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_category, purchase_date FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND behavior_category IN ('loyal', 'new') ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount, behavior_category FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_amount < 500 AND behavior_category <> 'churn' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_category, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND behavior_category IS NULL ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name='John';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, product_id FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id=1001 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, ct.amount, ct.transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN customer_transactions ct ON c.customer_id = ct.customer_id ORDER BY ct.amount DESC, ct.transaction_date ASC;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, COUNT(ct.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM customers c LEFT JOIN customer_transactions ct ON c.customer_id = ct.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_gender, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customers GROUP BY customer_gender;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_location = 'New York';

SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Feedback' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE gender='M';
SELECT name, birth_date, gender FROM customers ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_name='VIP';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY birth_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email, birth_date FROM customers WHERE gender = 'M' AND birth_date < '1990-01-01';

SELECT c.name, p.name as product_name, ps.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases purch ON c.id = purch.customer_id JOIN products p ON purch.product_id = p.id JOIN customer_segments ps ON c.id = ps.customer_id WHERE ps.segment_name = 'VIP';
SELECT c.name, SUM(p.amount) as total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.name, count(*) as total_purchases FROM customers c JOIN purchases purch ON c.id = purch.customer_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY total_purchases DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 50;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM behavior_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount, promotion_start_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM behavior_logs WHERE customer_id = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT category, preference_level FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 2 AND category = 'Electronics';
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE promotion_start_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY promotion_start_date ASC;
